title: HELP RIOT !! ARCADE ICON
body:
Help please ... i got the mission screen after my game saying that i unlocked "New Level icon" ..... but it doesn't appear in my icons inventory ... ??? i don't have any arcade icons .. so i can't start the missions.
PS: I unlocked the 2 other missions "A Short Task" and "Get Hooked".

replies.body: Most of those Arcade Poro icons have finally been delivered, albeit a little late I'll admit. Let me know if you still don't have yours and I can get another delivery crew sent out!
